title: 旧约 - 箴言(Proverbs) - 第 31 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 箴言(Proverbs) -- 第 31 章 ( 本篇共有 31 章 )

lineList.en: The words of king Lemuel, the prophecy that his mother taught him.
lineList.cn: 利慕伊勒王的言语，是他母亲教训他的真言。

lineList.en: What, my son? and what, the son of my womb? and what, the son of my vows?
lineList.cn: 我的儿阿，我腹中生的儿阿，我许愿得的儿阿，我当怎样教训你呢。

lineList.en: Give not thy strength unto women, nor thy ways to that which destroyeth kings.
lineList.cn: 不要将你的精力给妇女，也不要有败坏君王的行为。

lineList.en: It is not for kings, O Lemuel, it is not for kings to drink wine; nor for princes strong drink:
lineList.cn: 利慕伊勒阿，君王喝酒，君王喝酒不相宜。王子说，浓酒在那里也不相宜。

lineList.en: Lest they drink, and forget the law, and pervert the judgment of any of the afflicted.
lineList.cn: 恐怕喝了就忘记律例，颠倒一切困苦人的是非。

lineList.en: Give strong drink unto him that is ready to perish, and wine unto those that be of heavy hearts.
lineList.cn: 可以把浓酒给将亡的人喝。把清酒给苦心的人喝。

lineList.en: Let him drink, and forget his poverty, and remember his misery no more.
lineList.cn: 让他们喝了，就忘记他的贫穷，不在记念他的苦楚。

lineList.en: Open thy mouth for the dumb in the cause of all such as are appointed to destruction.
lineList.cn: 你当为哑吧（或作不能自辨的）开口，为一切孤独的伸冤。

lineList.en: Open thy mouth, judge righteously, and plead the cause of the poor and needy.
lineList.cn: 你当开口按公义判断，为困苦和穷乏的辨屈。

lineList.en: Who can find a virtuous woman? for her price is far above rubies.
lineList.cn: 才德的妇人，谁能得着呢，他的价值胜过珍珠。

lineList.en: The heart of her husband doth safely trust in her, so that he shall have no need of spoil.
lineList.cn: 他丈夫心里倚靠他，必不缺少利益。

lineList.en: She will do him good and not evil all the days of her life.
lineList.cn: 他一生使丈夫有益无损。

lineList.en: She seeketh wool, and flax, and worketh willingly with her hands.
lineList.cn: 他寻梢羊绒和麻，甘心用手作工。

lineList.en: She is like the merchants' ships; she bringeth her food from afar.
lineList.cn: 他好像商船从远方运粮来。

lineList.en: She riseth also while it is yet night, and giveth meat to her household, and a portion to her maidens.
lineList.cn: 未到黎明他就起来，把食物分给家中的人。将当作的工分派婢女。

lineList.en: She considereth a field, and buyeth it: with the fruit of her hands she planteth a vineyard.
lineList.cn: 他想得田地，就买来。用手所的之利，栽种葡萄园。

lineList.en: She girdeth her loins with strength, and strengtheneth her arms.
lineList.cn: 他以能力束腰，使膀臂有力。

lineList.en: She perceiveth that her merchandise is good: her candle goeth not out by night.
lineList.cn: 他觉得所经营的有利，他的灯终夜不灭。

lineList.en: She layeth her hands to the spindle, and her hands hold the distaff.
lineList.cn: 他手拿捻线竿。手把纺线车。

lineList.en: She stretcheth out her hand to the poor; yea, she reacheth forth her hands to the needy.
lineList.cn: 他张手周济困苦人，伸手帮补穷乏人。

lineList.en: She is not afraid of the snow for her household: for all her household are clothed with scarlet.
lineList.cn: 他不因下雪为家里的人担心，因为全家都穿着朱红衣服。

lineList.en: She maketh herself coverings of tapestry; her clothing is silk and purple.
lineList.cn: 他为自己制作绣花毯子，他的衣服，是细麻和紫色布作的。

lineList.en: Her husband is known in the gates, when he sitteth among the elders of the land.
lineList.cn: 他丈夫在城门口与本地的长老同坐，为众人所认识。

lineList.en: She maketh fine linen, and selleth it; and delivereth girdles unto the merchant.
lineList.cn: 他作细麻衣裳出卖。又将腰带卖与商家。

lineList.en: Strength and honour are her clothing; and she shall rejoice in time to come.
lineList.cn: 能力和威仪，是他的衣服。他想到日后的景况就喜笑。

lineList.en: She openeth her mouth with wisdom; and in her tongue is the law of kindness.
lineList.cn: 他开口就发智慧。他舌上有仁慈的法则。

lineList.en: She looketh well to the ways of her household, and eateth not the bread of idleness.
lineList.cn: 他观察家务，并不吃闲饭。

lineList.en: Her children arise up, and call her blessed; her husband also, and he praiseth her.
lineList.cn: 他的儿女起来称他有福。他的丈夫也称赞他，

lineList.en: Many daughters have done virtuously, but thou excellest them all.
lineList.cn: 说，才德的女子很多，惟独你超过一切。

lineList.en: Favour is deceitful, and beauty is vain: but a woman that feareth the LORD, she shall be praised.
lineList.cn: 艳丽是虚假的。美容是虚浮的。惟敬畏耶和华的妇女，必得称赞。

lineList.en: Give her of the fruit of her hands; and let her own works praise her in the gates.
lineList.cn: 愿他享受操作所得的。愿他的工作，在城门口荣耀他。
